fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: GCA especially supports the European industry development and for the jobs in the textile ad clothing industry in Europe and Poland. We are fighting against the unfair  competition  on the global market.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: GCA represents the interests of the national textile and cotton sector before the European Commission , European Parliament and national authorities - presenting the opinions, taking part in the consultation concerning the European law, custom policy, international agreements in all cases and matters important for our members.
